requirements.summary: Diagnose and resolve deployment error by ensuring all frontend dependencies, configurations, and build artifacts are properly configured
acceptanceCriteria: The application successfully deploys without errors
The deployed application is accessible and functional

file_operations.description: Verify React application entry point properly initializes all providers and mounts to DOM, ensuring QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider are correctly configured for production deployment
Verify TanStack Router configuration is complete with all route definitions, ensure router initialization handles production deployment scenarios, and confirm all imported components exist
Verify HTML entry point has correct title, meta tags, and root div element for React mounting, ensuring all referenced assets and scripts are accessible during deployment
Verify Tailwind configuration is valid with correct content paths for CSS purging during production build, ensuring all custom theme values are properly defined
Verify CSS imports are correct and all referenced assets (background images) exist in the public directory, ensuring Tailwind directives are properly structured for build process

Verify all imported assets and components exist, ensure image paths reference correct locations in public directory using workspace path frontend/public/assets/generated/jungle-banner.dim_1200x300.png and other referenced images
Verify all router navigation links are correctly configured and imported components exist, ensuring no broken dependencies that could cause build failures
Verify external links and icon components are properly imported and configured for production deployment
